distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for evince provides the following fix:

- CVE-2017-1000159: Prevent command line injections via filenames when printing to a file. (bsc#1070046)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Command injection in evince via filename when printing to PDF. This affects versions earlier than 3.25.91.
notes.title: CVE description
